title: Atelier telescopique
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20150205000045/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : [Design Firms](http://web.archive.org/web/20150205000045/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Design%20Firms) : Atelier télescopique**

[Stéphane Meurice](http://web.archive.org/web/20150205000045/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Stephane%20Meurice), [Sébastien Delobel](http://web.archive.org/web/20150205000045/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Sebastien%20Delobel), [Xavier Meurice](http://web.archive.org/web/20150205000045/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Xavier%20Meurice), [Guillaume Berry](http://web.archive.org/web/20150205000045/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Guillaume%20Berry) and [Baptiste Servais](http://web.archive.org/web/20150205000045/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Baptiste%20Servais) comprise l' **Atelier télescopique** and it's companion type foundry, **[AinsiFont](http://web.archive.org/web/20150205000045/http:/typophile.com/wiki/AinsiFont)**.  
This closely knit team of designers based in Lille, [France](http://web.archive.org/web/20150205000045/http:/typophile.com/wiki/France) opened its studio in [1998](http://web.archive.org/web/20150205000045/http:/typophile.com/wiki/1998).

URL: [Atelier télescopique](http://web.archive.org/web/20150205000045/http:/www.ateliertelescopique.com/) (studio website).

[Ainsifont](http://web.archive.org/web/20150205000045/http:/www.ainsifont.com/) (digital type foundry store).
author: gberry
